templates.content: We cannot accept payment from a HSA/FSA card. However, you can purchase the product and then submit the invoice to your health insurance provider for reimbursement. Or you can request an itemized quote from us, and submit it to your provider. They would either send you the funds to complete the purchase, or they would send the check directly to Fun and Function and reference the itemized quote.
templates.name: Can I pay with HSA/FSA card?
